JA.H1: 英語の自己学習者、海外への旅行者＆任者をサポートするコミュニティー

EN.H1: Community for learning Japanese and living in Japan
EN.MISSION1: Connect with other expats and immigrants in Japan
EN.MISSION2: Get information for living and travelling in Japan
EN.HERO2: It's free! Find connections. Share resources. Learn together.
EN.HELP1: Japanese sub-community: Join groups to practice writing and reading Japanese. Ask and answer any questions related to the Japanese language.
EN.HELP2: Regional sub-community: Join regional groups to get resources and connect with others in that region. Ask and answer questions related to travelling and living in that area.
EN.HELP3: Study buddy: Become a study buddy and find like-minded students to study Japanese. Do a cultural and language exchange in the comfort of your home. Volunteer to teach Japanese people learn English.
EN.HELP4: Marketplace: Going back home? Moving to Japan? Buy, sell or offer your used goods to future expats and immigrants.
EN.HERO3: We just began our journey, but is striving to be the biggest online community for English speakers learning Japanese and living in Japan.
